meanings.definition: To write in a different form or manner.
meanings.sent1: She rewrites her essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: The author rewrites the ending of the story to surprise the readers.
meanings.sent3: He rewrites his shopping list after realizing he forgot an item.
meanings.sent4: The artist rewrites reality through the lens of imagination.
meanings.sent5: Rewrites can transform a simple story into a captivating adventure.

meanings.definition: A revised version of written material.
meanings.sent1: The rewrites of the manuscript improved its clarity.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a copy of the rewrites for reference.
meanings.sent3: The teacher handed back the rewrites with encouraging feedback.
meanings.sent4: The rewrites of the play added depth to the characters.
meanings.sent5: The rewrites highlighted the author's growth and development.
